SEARCH
Package cambio.simulator.export

Class ReportCollector

java.lang.Object
desmoj.core.simulator.NamedObject
desmoj.core.report.ReportManager
cambio.simulator.export.ReportCollector
public class ReportCollector extends desmoj.core.report.ReportManager
Report Collector, utilizes desmojs' ReportManger to collect Reporters. Can combine data of multiple MultiDataPointReporter
Author:
Lion Wagner

    • getInstance

      public static ReportCollector getInstance()

    • collectData

      public Map<String,TreeMap<Double,Object>> collectData()
      Collects (and potentially combines) all results of all registered MultiDataPointReporter.
      Returns:
      returns the values of all MultiDataPointReporters

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the collector and all registered reporters.

    • printReport

      public void printReport(MiSimModel model)
      Writes the collected data to the report directory. Also updates the metadata file with the new execution timings.
      Parameters:
      model - The model that contains the metadata to reference.
